pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot Function for Single-Case Data Frames // Add-on for the 'scan' package that creates plots from single-case data frames ('scdf'). It includes functions for styling single-case plots, adding phase-based lines to indicate various statistical parameters, and predefined themes for presentations and publications. More information and in depth examples can be found in the online book "Analyzing Single-Case Data with R and 'scan" Jrgen Wilbert (2023) https://jazznbass.github.io/scan- Book/.
